name: aipromptstudio-website
description: AI Prompt Studio 官方网站 - 专业的AI提示词管理工具

scripts.build: echo '构建静态网站...' && npm run optimize
scripts.optimize: npm run optimize:html && npm run optimize:css && npm run optimize:js
scripts.optimize:html: if command -v htmlmin >/dev/null 2>&1; then htmlmin index.html -o dist/index.html; else cp index.html dist/; fi
scripts.optimize:css: if command -v csso >/dev/null 2>&1; then csso styles.css -o dist/styles.css; else cp styles.css dist/; fi
scripts.optimize:js: if command -v terser >/dev/null 2>&1; then terser script.js -c -m -o dist/script.js; else cp script.js dist/; fi
scripts.lint: npm run lint:html && npm run lint:css && npm run lint:js
scripts.lint:html: if command -v htmlhint >/dev/null 2>&1; then htmlhint index.html; else echo 'HTMLHint not installed'; fi
scripts.lint:css: if command -v stylelint >/dev/null 2>&1; then stylelint styles.css; else echo 'Stylelint not installed'; fi
scripts.lint:js: if command -v eslint >/dev/null 2>&1; then eslint script.js; else echo 'ESLint not installed'; fi
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.preview: npm run build && npm run serve
